comment: Wasnt too bad, a nice lady, was late with d2l grades but she wasnt an unresonable prof.

TAKE ENGL102 ONLINE. Banned electronics, but class was in a computer lab. Rude the one day we met, if we met. She's strict on attendance, but was late ALL THE TIME. Inconsistent HW w/ grading delays & responses A LOT + no real feedback; made it hard to adjust or know what you need to work on. She couldn't spell either (as an Eng teacher = WILD).
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--So many papers
